alert.note: Alert for Brantley (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 31 at 8:27AM EST until January 01 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Satilla River At Atkinson affecting Brantley County. Additional information is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/forecasts.php?wfo=jax. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 830 AM EST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Satilla River at Atkinson. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Warners Landing, Louis Landing and secondary roads around KOA campgrounds begin to flood. At 14.0 feet, River Rock Road begins to experience flooding across the road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM EST Sunday the stage was 13.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 12.1 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
